hint: Convert implicit joins to explicit INNER JOINs for clarity and optimizer control, push selective filters (city, income_band) directly into the JOIN conditions, and ensure all dimension lookups happen after filtering.

Isolate the most restrictive dimension filters (customer_address, income_band) into separate CTEs with explicit joins, then join the pre-filtered dimensions to the fact table (store_returns) and customer.

Materialize all filtered dimension tables and the fact table into separate CTEs using aggressive pre-filtering, then perform a final join between the materialized results, potentially forcing join order.
Decompose the star join using LATERAL subqueries to drive from the most selective dimension, transform implicit joins to EXISTS for customer lookups, and consider partitioned execution paths.
